hero.title:
Light Up Your
Moments
hero.subtitle: Professional event lighting for weddings, celebrations, and unforgettable nights on the Georgia coast

items.title: String Lights
items.description: Romantic bistro and Edison bulb string lights perfect for outdoor receptions, patios, and tent canopies.

items.title: Uplighting
items.description: Wireless LED uplighting to transform any venue with your color palette. Set the perfect mood.

items.title: Lanterns & Candles
items.description: Elegant lanterns and flameless candles for table centerpieces and pathway illumination.

items.title: Custom Installations
items.description: Unique lighting designs tailored to your vision. From intimate dinners to grand celebrations.

features.sectionSubtitle: The Golden Isles' Premier Event Lighting

items.title: Local Expertise
items.description: Based on St. Simons Island, we know the coastal Georgia venues inside and out.

items.title: Full Service
items.description: We handle delivery, professional installation, and teardown. You just enjoy the moment.

items.title: Flexible Packages
items.description: From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we have lighting solutions for every budget.

items.quote: Coastal Lighting made our beach wedding absolutely magical. The string lights over the dance floor created the perfect atmosphere.
items.name: Sarah & James

items.quote: Professional, on time, and the lighting looked incredible. Our guests couldn't stop talking about the ambiance.
items.name: Michelle Davis

contact.title: Ready to Light Up Your Event?
contact.subtitle: Tell us about your vision and we'll create something beautiful together.
